text.tspan: For a given automata A and a given input word w, let:
vector that equals zero at all states except those which
are visited infinitely often to the right by w, in which case
it is equal to the corresponding final weight in A.
rank 3 tensor such that for every input symbol x,
the matrix of transition weights for x
vector that equals zero at all states except those which
are visited infinitely often to the left by w, in which case
it is equal to the corresponding initial weight in A.
